trans-unit.source: An instance of BookmarkReachedEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> event.
trans-unit.target: BookmarkReachedEventArgs의 인스턴스를 만들 때의 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>발생 시키는 개체의 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>이벤트.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> event when it encounters a bookmark while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>발생는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>중 하나를 처리 하는 동안 책갈피를 발견 한 경우 이벤트는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, 또는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the name and location of the bookmark that triggered the event, access the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A> and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> properties in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: 이름 및 이벤트를 트리거한 책갈피의 위치를 가져오려면 액세스는 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A>및 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>속성에 대 한 이벤트 처리기에서.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the time offset at which the bookmark was reached.
trans-unit.target: 책갈피에 도달 했습니다 오프셋 시간을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the location in the audio input stream of a synthesis engine when the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트가 발생 했을 때 합성 엔진이의 입력된 오디오 스트림을의 위치를 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the bookmark that was reached.
trans-unit.target: 에 도달 했 고 책갈피의 이름을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value for the name of the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: 책갈피의 이름에 대 한 값을 반환합니다.
